ArchitectureÂ¶

The CGRateS framework consists of functionality packed within five software applications, described below.

  • cgr-engine
    • Agents
    • SessionS
    • RALs
    • CDRs
    • CDRe
    • AttributeS
    • ChargerS
    • ResourceS
    • SupplierS
    • StatS
    • ThresholdS
    • FilterS
    • DispatcherS
    • SchedulerS
    • APIerS
    • LoaderS
    • CacheS
    • DataDB
    • StorDB
  • cgr-console
  • cgr-loader
  • cgr-migrator
  • cgr-tester
